Author: MagnoliaPetal
Text: My standard advice: try psyllium husk fibre. It's awesome.  Other than that: does this happen often? If so, you might want to look into things that you've eaten on the days this happened and look for common nominators they have in common that might cause this.  Most common ones are lactose, gluten (even if you don't have celiac disease), raw vegetables and fruits, eggs and carbonated drinks.   Personally I've noticed huge improvements after cutting out lactose, gluten and eggs. The only thing that makes me bloat nowadays is the massive amounts of water I drink. ðŸ˜…
